args.text:
The top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Ver√•s Larsen are:
1. Lofoten Islands
2. Helgeland
3. Geirangerfjord
4. Jotunheimen
5. Aurlandsfjord
6. Rondane National Park
7. Sognefjord
8. Voss
9. Hardangerfjord
10. Telemark Canal

Paddling code for safety:
- Always wear a life jacket
- Never paddle alone
- Bring a map and compass
- Be prepared for changing weather conditions

For more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/
